source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud is considering how best to proceed with the hunt for the Mongrel.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud macht sich Sorgen um Tataru.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_01<tab>In the midst of considering your next course of action, Alphinaud suddenly realizes that Tataru is nowhere to be seen. Fearing that she may have run afoul of the revolutionaries, he rushes towards the doors leading to the Brume, motioning for you to follow.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_01<tab>Ihr beschließt, Tataru suchen zu gehen. Halte an <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9A2E020402 /var> in den Schwaden Ausschau.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_02<tab>You cast about for Tataru, but find no sign of her. Head to another vantage point and continue your search.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_02<tab>Tataru ist nicht zu sehen, aber gib nicht auf. Versuch es noch an einem anderen <var 32 ((EObj)) 06F61E9A2F020402 /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_03<tab>You spot Tataru being pursued by two men, and immediately give chase. Soon after, the strangers corner the trembling girl and seem set to do something unspeakable when Alphinaud accosts them from afar. His attempts to defuse the situation only serve to rile the men further, however, and violence appears inevitable─until a raven-haired woman with ruby eyes appears, and commands Tataru's tormentors to desist. It would seem her name is Hilda. In the taut silence which follows, she regards you with interest, waiting for you to state your reason for coming.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_03<tab>Du findest Tataru gerade, als sie von einigen Männern in die Ecke gedrängt wird, und rettest sie. Da taucht die Anführerin der Armen auf - Hilda. Endlich! Sprich mit ihr.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_04<tab>Before you can speak, Hilda suggests you accompany her to the Forgotten Knight, where you may discuss matters in private. Follow her to the tavern up above and continue your conversation there.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_04<tab>Hilda fordert dich dazu auf, ihr in den Vergessenen Ritter zu folgen, wo ihr ungestört reden könnt.

source:
TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_05At Hilda's request, Gibrillont orders his staff to clear the Forgotten Knight and grant you privacy, after which you explain your reasons for coming in full. As Alphinaud attempts to win the revolutionaries' cooperation─seemingly in vain─Ser Charibert, a knight of the Heavens' Ward, strides into the tavern, accusing you and the others of plotting insurrection. With no other options left to you, you accept his offer to step outside and face him in battle.

Joined by Lord Haurchefant and Lucia, you manage to overwhelm Ser Charibert, who withdraws. The joy of victory swiftly dissipates, however, when you learn that Ser Aymeric has been imprisoned, and the Heavens' Ward placed in command of the Temple Knights. Recognizing that the situation has come to a head, Hilda agrees to assist with the rescue mission.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_05<tab>Als du mit Hilda sprichst, platzt Charibert herein, ein Ritter der Azurgarde, und fordert euch zum Kampf. Gerade im rechten Moment erscheint Lucia und Charibert zieht sich zurück. Hilda sichert daraufhin ihre Hilfe bei der Stürmung der Kurie zu. Sprich vor dem Vergessenen Ritter noch einmal mit Hilda.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_06<tab>Recognizing your curiosity, Hilda explains that she took to calling herself “the Mongrel” out of a newfound pride for her mixed heritage, in spite of the discrimination she and others like her suffer. In the end, she declares, her followers have come to believe that the differences between lowborn and highborn are far greater than those between pureblood and mongrel. Thus united in purpose and pledged to Ser Aymeric's cause, they hope to bring about long overdue and lasting change.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SEQ_06<tab>Hildas Vater, ein Ritter, verstieß einst ihre Mutter von niedriger Herkunft, als sie schwanger wurde. Hilda meint, dass so ein Schicksal in Ishgard aber nichts Außer<var 16 /var>ge<var 16 /var>wöhn<var 16 /var>liches sei. Die Ungerechtigkeit in der Ge<var 16 /var>sell<var 16 /var>schaft hat den Zorn der einfachen Leute schon lange genährt. Nun sei es endlich Zeit für eine grundlegende Umwälzung.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_TODO_00<tab>Search for Tataru in the Brume.
TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_TODO_01<tab>Search for Tataru in the Brume.
TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Hilda at the Forgotten Knight.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_TODO_03<tab>Im Vergessenen Ritter mit Hilda sprechen

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>There must be a way we can draw the Mongrel out into the open. Hmm... Mayhap we should discuss this with Tataru.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>Es muss doch möglich sein, diese Langohr aufzuspüren. Vielleicht hat Tataru eine Idee.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_000_001<tab>Speaking of which, where is Tataru? She... Oh, confound it. She went below to make inquiries on her own, didn't she? We must find her quickly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I have a premonition this is not going to end well.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_000_001<tab>Wo ist sie übrigens? Ich dachte, sie wäre mit dir unterwegs - bist du ihr nicht begegnet? Wir sollten sie lieber suchen gehen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_000_002<tab>Where could she have gone? Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─try looking for her over there.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_000_002<tab>Keine Spur von ihr ... Sieh dich da drüben um ... oder weiter oben - ich weiß auch nicht. Ich habe von hier aus einen guten Überblick, falls sie vorbeikommt.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>You cast your gaze over the streets below, but see no sign of Tataru...
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>Von hier aus ist Tataru nicht zu sehen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_100_011<tab>She must be around here somewhere... I take it you've had no luck either?
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_100_011<tab>Keine Spur von Tataru hier ... Wie sieht's bei dir aus?

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_TATARU_000_010<tab>Uwaaah! I'm sorry, forget I said anything!
TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab><gasp> Those men are chasing her! Quickly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─after them!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>Jemand ist hinter ihr her! Los, schnell!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_017<tab>Before you start─let's go somewhere a bit more private, eh? The Forgotten Knight, say.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_017<tab>Hier können wir nicht reden. Los, in den Vergessenen Ritter!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_000_013<tab>For once, it would seem the fates are smiling upon us. Had those ruffians forced our hand, I dare not think what would have ensued.
TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_TATARU_000_014<tab>Th-They didn't much care for my story about the weathered cane...
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_TATARU_000_014<tab>I-Ich bin ja so froh, dass du noch rechtzeitig gekommen bist!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_REVOLUTIONARY1_000_015<tab>Whatever it is you've got to say, say it!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_REVOLUTIONARY1_000_015<tab>In den Fundamenten brauchen wir keine „Helden“, kapiert? Hier gelten andere Gesetze.
TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_REVOLUTIONARY2_000_016<tab>Wer Hilda auch nur ein Haar krümmt, kann seine Knochen nummerieren, nur damit das klar ist.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_100_013<tab>I think it best if you take the lead this time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_TATARU_100_014<tab>If you're nervous, I could try parleying with them on our behalf. Perhaps they'd be interested in techniques for working lauan logs...or maybe the tale of the cursed gladius? Oh, I know─the legendary skillet! Everyone loves that one!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_TATARU_100_014<tab>Puh, mir schlottern noch immer die Knie ...!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_020<tab>Let me guess: you're wondering why I chose “the Mongrel,” right?
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_020<tab>Das mit dem „Langohr“ geht euch nicht aus dem Sinn, was?

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_021<tab>Because it's what I am, and I'm not ashamed of it. Not anymore.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_021<tab>Ich hab schon mitbekommen, dass ihr euch erkundigt habt. Die Geschichten stimmen - wo ich herkomme und alles.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_023<tab>Besides, even my pureblood pups have more in common with me than the lords and ladies up on high. They none of 'em are well bred. Hells, some of their mothers were cast out after a spot of fun, same as mine.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_023<tab>Tja, ich schäme mich nicht dafür. Nicht mehr. Und dass sich ein Adeliger an einem hübschen Mädel aus dem Volk vergreift, ist gar nicht so ungewöhnlich, wisst ihr. Dass er meine Mutter rausgeworfen hat, als ich im Anmarsch war, auch nicht wirklich.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_024<tab>Story old as time─and one we're sick of hearing, which is why we took up arms.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_024<tab>Die benutzen uns, wie es ihnen gefällt. Im verschwiegenen Kämmerlein sollen wir ihnen dienen und draußen auf dem Acker und auf dem Schlachtfeld - hah! Aber damit wird bald Schluss sein! Dafür werde ich sorgen - mit Pulver und Blei.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_025<tab>Not that we mean to hold <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> the blue bloods to account. Some have done right by us, I'll allow, like them in House Haillenarte.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_025<tab>Klar, nicht alle von denen sind Schweine. Und immerhin kann ich wegen denen jetzt mit Schusswaffen umgehen!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_026<tab>Not that we mean to hold <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> the blue bloods to account. Some have done right by us, I'll allow, like them in House Haillenarte. 'Course, you'd know all about that, wouldn't you?
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_026<tab>Klar, nicht alle von denen sind Schweine. Und immerhin kann ich wegen denen jetzt mit Schusswaffen umgehen. Ich vermute, du kennst sogar den Typ, der mir die Pistole hier verschafft hat. Der ist in Ordnung.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_027<tab>But enough talk. Your friend's still rotting in a cell. Let's not keep him waiting.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HILDA_000_027<tab>Aber genug gequasselt. Jetzt lasst uns mal was ins Rollen bringen in diesem vermoderten Mauerwerk!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>I had not reckoned with the Temple Knights' involvement... Not as <var 1A 02 /var>enemies<var 1A 01 /var>, at any rate.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>Ein Großteil der Tempelritter hat sich also gegen ihren Großmeister gestellt ... Das war zu befürchten.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_TATARU_000_031<tab>First Ser Grinnaux and Ser Paulecrain, and now this Charibert character... I mean, it makes you wonder, doesn't it? Are <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> the knights of the Heavens' Ward this bad?
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_TATARU_000_031<tab>Wie hoch dieser Ritter gesprungen ist ...! Brrr, ich bin froh, dass er fort ist.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_REVOLUTIONARY1_000_032<tab>Bugger me if you ain't everythin' they say! How in the hells did you do that thing with the other thing!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_REVOLUTIONARY1_000_032<tab>Gar nicht schlecht, das muss ich sagen! Du hast da ein paar nette Tricks drauf.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_REVOLUTIONARY2_000_033<tab>Hoo hoo hoo! You didn't half give that highborn scum what for! That was a sight for sore eyes, that was!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_REVOLUTIONARY2_000_033<tab>Diesem schleimigen Azurgardisten haben wir die Visage poliert, haha!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HAURCHEFANT_000_034<tab>Time is of the essence, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We must move quickly, before they discern our intent!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_HAURCHEFANT_000_034<tab>Das erste Gefecht kam früher als erwartet. Unsere Gegner haben ihre Stellung schon gefestigt.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_LUCIA_000_035<tab>I never liked him, not since his days as an inquisitor. He took far too much pleasure in his work.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_LUCIA_000_035<tab>Charibert hat sich mit seinen Grausamkeiten im Dienste der Inquisition einen Namen gemacht. Er genießt es, Leute zu quälen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_QIB_BATTLETALK_HILDA_002<tab>If it's a fight you want, then come and get it!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_QIB_BATTLETALK_HILDA_002<tab>Dann lass uns mal sehen, <var 1A 02 /var>wer<var 1A 01 /var> hier um den Tod winseln wird!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_QIB_BATTLETALK_CHARIBERT_003<tab>My, such fury! Patience, my queen. We've only just begun.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_QIB_BATTLETALK_CHARIBERT_003<tab>Na, na, meine verehrte Königin der Gosse. Nur nicht so stürmisch!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_QIB_BATTLETALK_CHARIBERT_006<tab>It seems you are beyond reason. How marvelous...
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_QIB_BATTLETALK_CHARIBERT_006<tab>Mit Vernunft kann man bei dir nichts ausrichten, was?

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_QIB_BATTLETALK_HAURCHEFANT_008<tab>Stop this, all of you! It is madness! Why are you fighting!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_QIB_BATTLETALK_HAURCHEFANT_008<tab>Hört auf! Was ist in euch gefahren? Warum kämpft ihr?!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_QIB_BATTLETALK_CHARIBERT_010<tab>Hmph. How fitting. The noble bastard and the mongrel bitch.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_QIB_BATTLETALK_CHARIBERT_010<tab>Hmpf, wie passend. Die beiden unstatthaften Sprösslinge in trauter Zweisamkeit!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_QIB_BATTLETALK_HILDA_009<tab>This mongrel bitch is going to put a bullet between your eyes!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_QIB_BATTLETALK_HILDA_009<tab>Dir steckt gleich eine Kugel zwischen deinen adeligen Augen!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA403_01639_QIB_BATTLETALK_ALPHINAUD_011<tab>I suppose now is as good a time as any...
